jobInfo.jobName: 电机测试（接受24届应届生）
jobInfo.postDescription:
Responsibilities:
• Participate in requirement and design document review from motor test perspective.
• Create test plan according to product requirement specification, feature specification and related regulation together with CPO.
• Prepare the test setup and environment according to the test plan.
• Perform the defined test cases according to the test plan and generate test report and fulfill requirement. E.g. Product feature, requirement and test standard…
• Record the product error during test and support the debug process together with development engineers.
• Maintain test lab equipment and infrastructure according to lab management regulation (E.g. ISO17025, …)
• Analysis and support of field problems.

Qualifications:
• Education (Bachelor or above degree in electrical, electronic, motor, automation control field)
• Commissioning skill of drive and motor system
• Experience in execution of motor test, such as environmental, heating test, mechanical or experience in servo drive and motor application and test is a plus
• Knowledge of test standard is a plus
• Knowhow about PLC programming is a plus
• Good communication skill
• Fluently in oral and written English with CET 4 or above.
• Good experience on Trouble shooting.
jobInfo.address: 南京溧水区南京润淮大道18号

brandComInfo.introduce: 成立于2000年，瞬联是一家提供技术咨询、软件研发及行业级整体技术解决方案的专业服务供应商。瞬联在电信、嵌入式、IoT、汽车、移动互联网及企业软件方案等领域拥有超过20年的深厚研发经验。瞬联通过其优质的交付能力、灵活的合作模式和客户导向的理念赢得了许多世界500强企业客户，公司在大中华地区、美国、加拿大、欧洲的主要城市设有办公室和研发中心。近年来，瞬联11次被国际外包专业协会（IAOP）评为全球外包行业100强公司，同时也屡次得到Gartner、IDC和中国外包网等国内外机构的奖项和荣誉。瞬联拥有ISO9001和27001认证以及CMMI3证书（含敏捷开发流程）。
